meta.label: Custom Color Palette
meta.description: Define custom hex colors for Gantt chart task bars

params.name: palette_name
params.label: Palette Name
params.description: Display name for this palette (for reference only)

params.name: colors
params.label: Colors
params.description:
JSON array of hex color codes.

Example:
["#3498db", "#2ecc71", "#e67e22", "#9b59b6", "#e74c3c", "#1abc9c"]

Requirements:
- Minimum 6 colors, maximum 12
- Format: #RGB or #RRGGBB
